name: codemotion-meetup-2019
description: Fast & Furious: Java Serverless without a JVM!

scripts.watch: reveal-md README.md --theme theme/theme.css --highlight-theme github --title 'codemotion meetup' --css theme/custom.css,theme/asciinema-player.css --scripts theme/asciinema-player.js -w
scripts.build: reveal-md README.md --theme theme/theme.css --highlight-theme github --title 'codemotion meetup' --css theme/custom.css,theme/asciinema-player.css --scripts theme/asciinema-player.js --static-dirs media,theme,cast --static _site
scripts.print: reveal-md README.md --theme theme/theme.css --highlight-theme github --title 'codemotion meetup' --css theme/custom.css,theme/asciinema-player.css --scripts theme/asciinema-player.js --print slides.pdf

author: Paulo Lopes
